metadata.title: CVE-2019-3993 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: ELOG 3.1.4-57bea22 and below is affected by an information disclosure vulnerability. A remote unauthenticated attacker can recover a user's password hash by sending a crafted HTTP POST request.

criterions.comment: elog package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
